name: Home for Christmas
description: Kailyn adjusts to sharing Issac for the holidays and being alone on Christmas and makes a gesture to amend her relationship with Jo’s mom Janet. Jenelle spends Christmas with Jace and her mom but as the day goes on things get tense when she starts to regret filing charges against Kieffer that put him in jail. The twins’ first birthday and Christmas are in the same week, so Leah is working extra hard to make the holidays special since the twins spend their first Christmas in intensive care. Chelsea and Adam make up and Chelsea tries to enjoy Christmas activities with Adam and Aubree despite Randy banning him from this holiday celebration.
